page.title: 05A School Day
page.content: At 7.00am on a school day my alarm wakes me up, and I get dressed and washed, and I put the stair_gate up for Michael. Then at about 7.10am to 7.15am, I lay the breakfast for 7.30am. At about 7.40am we have breakfast, I have muesli with milk,and tea and toast to follow. At about 8.30am I go to school. When I arrive I set up the projector, if I have any spare time after that I go out on the playground.Then it is assembly and the various lessons of the day follow. At 3.30pm I go home and do my homework, after that I ask my mum if she wants me to help. If she does I help her if not I play with my brothers. Then at 5.45pm to 6.30pm we have dinner, and after that I peel tomorrows spuds,then I make my packed lunches. Sometimes I help in the garden or read and play my game until bedtime.
